name: darksabre76's Apps
short_description:
This project encapsulates my PA.c apps. Currently, I am packaging quite a few apps including BlueJ, Media Player Classic Home Cinema, and ScummVM. BlueJ will be hosted at its own project page until the official release. Then the entire project will migrate here. Currently a rolling archive of all prior releases will be hosted here as well, in anticipation of official release.

Disclaimer: Unless otherwise specified, all of the applications packaged here are property of their respective owners or rights-holders. I do not take any credit for developing the base applications or the packaging methods used. If there is a problem with your application being packaged and hosted here, I will work with you to find a reasonable solution.
summary: This will be home to most all my PA.c apps
